channel.title: [PI]Pk Area Won't Work? What'd I Do Wrong?
channel.description:
Ok I've been trying to make it so edgeville bank is safe and all around it is pvp. Thats the whole code in player.java. the second to last locations are what I added. Anything I need to change? Because it won't make the outside pvp?
public boolean inMulti() { if((absX >= 3136 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3519 && absY <= 3607) || (absX >= 3210 && absX <= 3339 && absY >= 9333 && absY <= 9424) || (heightLevel == 0 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) || (heightLevel == 1 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) || (heightLevel == 2 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) || (absX >= 2607 && absX <= 2644 && absY >= 3296 && absY <= 3332) || (absX >= 2949 && absX <= 3001 && absY >= 3370 && absY <= 3392) || (absX >= 2338 && absX <= 2392 && absY >= 4936 && absY <= 4987) || (absX >= 3250 && absX <= 3342 && absY >= 9800 && absY <= 9870) || (absX >= 3190 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3648 && absY <= 3839) || (absX >= 3200 && absX <= 3390 && absY >= 3840 && absY <= 3967) || (absX >= 2992 && absX <= 3007 && absY >= 3912 && absY <= 3967) || (absX >= 2946 && absX <= 2959 && absY >= 3816 && absY <= 3831) || (absX >= 3008 && absX <= 3199 && absY >= 3856 && absY <= 3903) || (absX >= 3008 && absX <= 3071 && absY >= 3600 && absY <= 3711) || (absX >= 3072 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3608 && absY <= 3647) || (absX >= 2624 && absX <= 2690 && absY >= 2550 && absY <= 2619) || (absX >= 2371 && absX <= 2422 && absY >= 5062 && absY <= 5117) || (absX >= 2896 && absX <= 2927 && absY >= 3595 && absY <= 3630) || (absX >= 2892 && absX <= 2932 && absY >= 4435 && absY <= 4464) || (absX >= 3091 && absX <= 3098 && absY >= 3499 && absY <= 3488) || (absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <= 4711)) { return true; } return false; }

item.title: [PI]Pk Area Won't Work? What'd I Do Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Baneful Baneful
item.description:
@Baneful wrote:

Ok I’ve been trying to make it so edgeville bank is safe and all around it is pvp. Thats the whole code in player.java. the second to last locations are what I added. Anything I need to change? Because it won’t make the outside pvp?

public boolean inMulti() {
	if((absX >= 3136 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3519 && absY <= 3607) || 
		(absX >= 3210 && absX <= 3339 && absY >= 9333 && absY <= 9424) ||
		(heightLevel == 0 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) ||
		(heightLevel == 1 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) ||
		(heightLevel == 2 && absX <= 2950 && absX >= 2810 && absY >= 5250 && absY <= 5370) ||
		(absX >= 2607 && absX <= 2644 && absY >= 3296 && absY <= 3332) ||
		(absX >= 2949 && absX <= 3001 && absY >= 3370 && absY <= 3392) ||
		(absX >= 2338 && absX <= 2392 && absY >= 4936 && absY <= 4987) ||
		(absX >= 3250 && absX <= 3342 && absY >= 9800 && absY <= 9870) ||  
		(absX >= 3190 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3648 && absY <= 3839) ||  
		(absX >= 3200 && absX <= 3390 && absY >= 3840 && absY <= 3967) || 
		(absX >= 2992 && absX <= 3007 && absY >= 3912 && absY <= 3967) || 
		(absX >= 2946 && absX <= 2959 && absY >= 3816 && absY <= 3831) || 
		(absX >= 3008 && absX <= 3199 && absY >= 3856 && absY <= 3903) || 
		(absX >= 3008 && absX <= 3071 && absY >= 3600 && absY <= 3711) || 
		(absX >= 3072 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3608 && absY <= 3647) ||
		(absX >= 2624 && absX <= 2690 && absY >= 2550 && absY <= 2619) ||
		(absX >= 2371 && absX <= 2422 && absY >= 5062 && absY <= 5117) ||
		(absX >= 2896 && absX <= 2927 && absY >= 3595 && absY <= 3630) ||
		(absX >= 2892 && absX <= 2932 && absY >= 4435 && absY <= 4464) ||
		(absX >= 3091 && absX <= 3098 && absY >= 3499 && absY <= 3488) ||
		(absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <= 4711)) {
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}
